playerFootEffect_bySFX.Wiki: The identifier used for the SFX ID of the automatic foot effect. It corresponds to ZZZ of XYYZZZ.

snipeModeDrawAlpha_FadeTime.AltName: Precision Shoot - Player Model Fade Time
snipeModeDrawAlpha_FadeTime.Wiki: The fade time when hiding the player during precision shooting. The unit is seconds

toughnessRecoverCorrection.Wiki: A correction value used to calculate the player's toughness recovery time.

defaultNumberOfItemSlots.Wiki: The default number of item slots a player has.

maxNumberOfItemSlots.Wiki: The max number of item slots a player can have.

animeID_DropItemPick.Wiki: Animation ID when picking up a drop item

resistRecoverPoint_Sleep_Player.Wiki: Player resistance value recovery amount_sleep point / s

flareOverrideHomingAngle.Wiki: Flare overwrite guidance performance deg / s (-1 no overwrite)

flareOverrideHomingStopRange.Wiki: Flare overwrite guidance stop distance m (-1 no overwrite)

animeID_SleepCollectorItemPick.AltName: Sleep Collector Item Pick-up - Animation ID
animeID_SleepCollectorItemPick.Wiki: Animation ID when acquiring Nemuri item

unlockEventFlagBaseId_forWepAttr.AltName: Weapon Affinity Unlock - Base Event Flag ID
unlockEventFlagBaseId_forWepAttr.Wiki: Weapon attribute ban event flag base ID

systemEnchant_BigRune.Wiki: Special effect Id to call when a large rune is activated from the system

lowStatus_AtkPowDown.Wiki: Insufficient status Basic attack power reduction

guardStatusCorrect_MaxStatusVal.Wiki: Maximum status value to increase performance used when calculating the status correction value of shield performance

unlockEventFlagStepNum_forWepAttr.AltName: Weapon Affinity Unlock - Event Flag Step Offset
unlockEventFlagStepNum_forWepAttr.Wiki: How much space is left for each weapon attribute ID from the base ID. Weapon attribute ban event flag ID = Weapon attribute ban event flag base ID + Weapon attribute ID x Weapon attribute ban event flag number of steps

retributionMagic_damageCountNum.Wiki: Causal Retribution_Number of Damages Before Counterattack

retributionMagic_damageCountRemainTime.Wiki: Causal response_Number of damages until counterattack Duration s

retributionMagic_burstDmypolyId.AltName: Retribution Magic - Explosion Dummy Poly ID

retributionMagic_burstMagicParamId.AltName: Retribution Magic - Explosion Magic Param ID

chrAimCam_rideOffsetHeight.AltName: Mounted Precision Shoot - Camera Offset Height
chrAimCam_rideOffsetHeight.Wiki: Riding precision shooting camera offset height

boltPouchWepBindDmypolyId.Wiki: Bolt cylinder adsorption Damipoly ID (However, if the bolt cylinder is used alone, the quiver Damipoly ID is used)

estusFlaskAllocateRate.Wiki: Multi-time client bottle correction magnification (0.5 specified to halve the number of possessions)

kickAcceptanceDeg.Wiki: Angle at which a kick can be taken when viewed from the front of the player

npcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_Light.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players %. lightweight.

npcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_Normal.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players %. Medium weight.

npcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_Heavy.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players %. weight.

npcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_WeightOver.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players %. Overweight.

npcPlayerAnalogWeightRate_SuperLight.Wiki: Analog weight ratio for NPC players %. Super lightweight.

clearCountCorrectBaseSpEffectId.Wiki: Criteria ID for special effects applied for lap correction

arrowBoltModelIdOffset.Wiki: Offset added to the model ID when equipped in slot 1 when displaying the arrow and bolt models. (Model Id + offset value)

arrowBoltRemainingNumModelMaskThreshold1.Wiki: When displaying the arrow and bolt models, the one-step judgment value % of the threshold value when applying the display mask by the number. (If it is more than this value, it is displayed in one step)

arrowBoltRemainingNumModelMaskThreshold2.Wiki: Two-step judgment value % of the threshold value when applying a display mask based on the number of arrows and bolt models. (If it is more than this value, it is displayed in 2 steps)

resistRecoverPoint_Blood_Player.Wiki: Player resistance recovery amount_bleeding point / s

resistRecoverPoint_Freeze_Enemy.Wiki: Enemy resistance value recovery amount_cold air point / s

requestTimeLeftBothHand.AltName: Button Input Time for Both-Hand Left
requestTimeLeftBothHand.Wiki: Button input time when holding both left hand

resistRecoverPoint_Madness_Player.Wiki: Player resistance value recovery amount_madness point / s

animeID_MaterialItemPick.Wiki: Animation ID when picking up a material item

revenantSummon3_BuddyParamId.Wiki: The buddy param ID for the slot 3 revenant summon.

markingAtkParamId.Wiki: Attack param that triggers Ironeye's marking effect.\nSeems to be only when used by the player.

necromancyTriggerRate.Wiki: Chance for Necromancy to trigger when an enemy is killed by Revenant or the family.

necromancyEffectId_1.Wiki: Effect added to ghost raised by Necromancy.

necromancyEffectId_2.Wiki: Effect added to ghost raised by Necromancy.

necromancyEffectId_3.Wiki: Effect added to ghost raised by Necromancy.
